name: A Point In Time
description:
A Point In Time 

Dive into the story adventure  of Mabel, a girl who gets access to the time machine of her passed away grandpa.

  

Pick up items or deploy them in specific places to alter the future, while encountering problems you may caused yourself.  

Overcome time related puzzles to complete the time machine's mechanism to fullfill your journey.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space/Enter - Interact/Scroll Text
